comment:
* A class representing an Address, i.e, a set of Strings describing a location.
 *
 * The address format is a simplified version of xAL (eXtensible Address Language)
 * http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/ciq/ciq.html#6

methods.name: public Locale getLocale()
methods.comment: * Returns the Locale associated with this address.

methods.name: public int getMaxAddressLineIndex()
methods.comment:
* Returns the largest index currently in use to specify an address line.
     * If no address lines are specified, -1 is returned.

methods.name: public String getAddressLine(int index)
methods.comment:
* Returns a line of the address numbered by the given index
     * (starting at 0), or null if no such line is present.
     *
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if index < 0

methods.name: public void setAddressLine(int index, String line)
methods.comment:
* Sets the line of the address numbered by index (starting at 0) to the
     * given String, which may be null.
     *
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if index < 0

methods.name: public String getFeatureName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the feature name of the address, for example, "Golden Gate Bridge", or null
     * if it is unknown

methods.name: public void setFeatureName(String featureName)
methods.comment: * Sets the feature name of the address to the given String, which may be null

methods.name: public String getAdminArea()
methods.comment:
* Returns the administrative area name of the address, for example, "CA", or null if
     * it is unknown

methods.name: public void setAdminArea(String adminArea)
methods.comment: * Sets the administrative area name of the address to the given String, which may be null

methods.name: public String getSubAdminArea()
methods.comment:
* Returns the sub-administrative area name of the address, for example, "Santa Clara County",
     * or null if it is unknown

methods.name: public void setSubAdminArea(String subAdminArea)
methods.comment: * Sets the sub-administrative area name of the address to the given String, which may be null

methods.name: public String getLocality()
methods.comment: * Returns the locality of the address, for example "Mountain View", or null if it is unknown.

methods.name: public void setLocality(String locality)
methods.comment: * Sets the locality of the address to the given String, which may be null.

methods.name: public String getSubLocality()
methods.comment:
* Returns the sub-locality of the address, or null if it is unknown.
     * For example, this may correspond to the neighborhood of the locality.

methods.name: public void setSubLocality(String sublocality)
methods.comment: * Sets the sub-locality of the address to the given String, which may be null.

methods.name: public String getThoroughfare()
methods.comment:
* Returns the thoroughfare name of the address, for example, "1600 Ampitheater Parkway",
     * which may be null

methods.name: public void setThoroughfare(String thoroughfare)
methods.comment: * Sets the thoroughfare name of the address, which may be null.

methods.name: public String getSubThoroughfare()
methods.comment:
* Returns the sub-thoroughfare name of the address, which may be null.
     * This may correspond to the street number of the address.

methods.name: public void setSubThoroughfare(String subthoroughfare)
methods.comment: * Sets the sub-thoroughfare name of the address, which may be null.

methods.name: public String getPremises()
methods.comment: * Returns the premises of the address, or null if it is unknown.

methods.name: public void setPremises(String premises)
methods.comment: * Sets the premises of the address to the given String, which may be null.

methods.name: public String getPostalCode()
methods.comment:
* Returns the postal code of the address, for example "94110",
     * or null if it is unknown.

methods.name: public void setPostalCode(String postalCode)
methods.comment:
* Sets the postal code of the address to the given String, which may
     * be null.

methods.name: public String getCountryCode()
methods.comment:
* Returns the country code of the address, for example "US",
     * or null if it is unknown.

methods.name: public void setCountryCode(String countryCode)
methods.comment:
* Sets the country code of the address to the given String, which may
     * be null.

methods.name: public String getCountryName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the localized country name of the address, for example "Iceland",
     * or null if it is unknown.

methods.name: public void setCountryName(String countryName)
methods.comment:
* Sets the country name of the address to the given String, which may
     * be null.

methods.name: public boolean hasLatitude()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if a latitude has been assigned to this Address,
     * false otherwise.

methods.name: public double getLatitude()
methods.comment:
* Returns the latitude of the address if known.
     *
     * @throws IllegalStateException if this Address has not been assigned
     * a latitude.

methods.name: public void setLatitude(double latitude)
methods.comment: * Sets the latitude associated with this address.

methods.name: public void clearLatitude()
methods.comment: * Removes any latitude associated with this address.

methods.name: public boolean hasLongitude()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if a longitude has been assigned to this Address,
     * false otherwise.

methods.name: public double getLongitude()
methods.comment:
* Returns the longitude of the address if known.
     *
     * @throws IllegalStateException if this Address has not been assigned
     * a longitude.

methods.name: public void setLongitude(double longitude)
methods.comment: * Sets the longitude associated with this address.

methods.name: public void clearLongitude()
methods.comment: * Removes any longitude associated with this address.

methods.name: public String getPhone()
methods.comment:
* Returns the phone number of the address if known,
     * or null if it is unknown.
     *
     * @throws IllegalStateException if this Address has not been assigned
     * a phone number.

methods.name: public void setPhone(String phone)
methods.comment: * Sets the phone number associated with this address.

methods.name: public String getUrl()
methods.comment:
* Returns the public URL for the address if known,
     * or null if it is unknown.

methods.name: public void setUrl(String Url)
methods.comment: * Sets the public URL associated with this address.

methods.name: public Bundle getExtras()
methods.comment: * Returns additional provider-specific information about the * address as a Bundle. The keys and values are determined * by the provider. If no additional information is available, * null is returned. * *

methods.name: public void setExtras(Bundle extras)
methods.comment:
* Sets the extra information associated with this fix to the
     * given Bundle.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)

methodNames: public void setAddressLine(int index, String line)
public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
